hero.title: Pure, Golden, Unforgettable.
hero.subtitle: Discover the finest, purest honey from around the world, delivered straight to your door.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose HoneyHub?
whyChoose.naturalText: Our honey is raw, unfiltered, and free from any additives.
whyChoose.sustainableText: We partner with beekeepers who prioritize bee health and environmental sustainability.
whyChoose.flavorsText: From Clover to Manuka, explore a world of unique and delicious tastes.

recipeSuggestions.title: AI Recipe Suggestions
recipeSuggestions.description: Select a honey type and let our AI chef suggest delicious recipes for you.
recipeSuggestions.preferencesPlaceholder: e.g., vegetarian, gluten-free, quick and easy
recipeSuggestions.placeholderText: Fill out the form to the left to get started and discover your next favorite meal.

blog.title: The Hive Blog
blog.subtitle: Sweet stories, healthy recipes, and the latest buzz from the world of honey.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Have a question or a comment? Drop us a line, we'd love to hear from you.
contact.messagePlaceholder: Tell us how we can help...
contact.emailUsText: Send us an email for any inquiry.
